resources.string: Currently changing my profession to Android developer. Extremely motivated to grow professionally in this new field of work. Like to learn, test and perfect new skills. Looking forward to all the challenges and opportunities that career in software development brings.
SGGW - Warsaw University of Life Science

Provided technical support, including applying changes to websites and databases

Leniwiec Biz, Head of Technical Support
Developed Android application for easy gift choosing using Allegro Web API

Java and Android bootcamp (360h) included: Basics of Java (including Java 8). Introduction to Android, Android SDK. Basics of materlian design, databases, http comunication. Usage of google play services. Creating simple applications (both single activity and multicomponent).
